message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with $105 for the product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
